name: Il Pleut Cowboy
description:
Small experiment with unity made for school @ Arts Numériques/ESA Saint-Luc Bruxelles.

Draw sword with "R".

Thanks to:

- Yarn & YarnSpinner for the dialog system ! (check their website http://www.secretlab.com.au/yarnspinner )

- MalberS Animations for the Cowboy asset.*

- Digital Ruby (Jeff johnson) for the RainMaker particle system.*

*: Both free on the assetStore of Unity.
